subject: Hurricane Ike
Stadiums and Arenas
Hurricanes and Tropical Storms
Football
lead_paragraph: The game between the Baltimore Ravens and the Houston Texans was rescheduled to Nov. 9 after Reliant Stadium was severely damaged by Hurricane Ike.
snippet: The game between the Baltimore Ravens and the Houston Texans was rescheduled to Nov. 9 after Reliant Stadium was severely damaged by Hurricane Ike.
